item.title: [OJ-82] Invoices Page
item.description:
Develop the Invoices Page that allows staff to create, view, and manage all customer invoices.
Invoices can be auto-generated from completed jobs or created manually.
Users can view invoice statuses, send invoices via email, download PDFs, and collect payments through integrated gateways (Stripe, North, PayPal).
All finalized invoices push unidirectionally to Zoho Books for accounting purposes.

Functional Requirements

�� Internal Invoices Page

  • List all invoices with filters: Status, Client, Date Range, Payment Method.
  • Status workflow: Draft → Sent → Paid → Overdue.
  • Allow manual invoice creation (from dropdown or "New Invoice" button).
  • Auto-generate invoice from completed Jobs (triggered automatically from Jobs page).
  • Send invoice via email (FuseTrix SMTP) with attached PDF and payment link.
  • Generate invoice PDF with company branding and tax details.
  • Record all payments via integrated gateways: Fusetrix Payments API
  • Display payment and status updates in real time (webhooks or polling).
  • Push finalized invoice data (Sent or Paid) to Zoho Books via master credentials (unidirectional).
  • Maintain audit logs for all invoice actions (create, send, pay).

item.title: [OJ-81] Jobs Page
item.description:
Develop the Jobs Page that allows staff to view, assign, and complete jobs efficiently.
The page must display active, upcoming, and completed jobs, support technician assignment, allow uploading notes/photos, and auto-generate invoices after completion.
All data originates in FuseTrix and pushes unidirectionally to Zoho FSM/Books via the master account.

Functional Requirements

�� Internal Jobs Management Page

  • Display jobs in a tabular view with filters: Status, Assigned Technician, Date Range, Client.
  • Status workflow: Scheduled → In Progress → Completed → Invoiced.
  • Job details include: Client, Address, Service Type, Technician(s), Start Time, End Time, Status, Notes.
  • Assign or reassign technicians via dropdown (auto-save).
  • Allow marking a job as Completed and uploading notes and photos.
  • Automatically generate an invoice upon job completion:
    • Create internal invoice record.
    • Push invoice to Zoho Books (unidirectional).
  • Maintain audit log for assignment changes and completion.

�� Optional (for extension later)

  • Add job timeline in modal or drawer.
  • Add route to view associated quotes and requests.
  • Sync completed jobs to calendar automatically (integration with Schedule page).

item.title: [OJ-80] Quotes Page
item.description:
Implement a Quotes Page for internal users to create, manage, and send quotes, and a corresponding Customer Portal interface where clients can view and approve quotes online.

Approved quotes automatically create a Job and push to the master Zoho FSM/Books (unidirectional flow: FuseTrix → Zoho).
Clients access the quote via secure shareable link (JWT or UUID token), can review pricing and terms, and digitally approve using the FuseTrix internal e-signature module.

Functional Requirements

�� Internal (Staff) Quotes Page

  • Create, view, and edit quotes linked to a client.
  • Quote fields: Client, Service Items, Quantity, Unit Price, Total, Tax, Terms & Conditions.
  • Status workflow: Draft → Sent → Approved → Declined.
  • Send quote via:
    • Email (FuseTrix SMTP)
    • Shareable portal link (auto-generated, token-based)
  • Convert Approved quotes into Jobs automatically.
  • Show audit log (who created, sent, and approved).
  • Push all Approved quotes to Zoho Books via master account.

�� Customer Portal (Client View)

  • Public-facing, secure page (JWT/UUID-based link).
  • Displays quote details, total, and breakdown.
  • "Approve Quote" button → triggers e-signature capture.
  • "Decline" button → records reason.
  • Confirmation screen on action completion.
  • Sends email/SMS notification back to internal team.

item.title: [OJ-79] Requests Page
item.description:
Build the Requests Page that allows users to create, view, and manage service requests from clients.
Each request should be linked to a client, have a clear status (New → In Progress → Converted → Closed), and support one-click conversion into a Quote or Job.
All conversions push finalized data unidirectionally from FuseTrix → Zoho CRM/FSM using the master account.

Functional Requirements

  • Create a new service request linked to an existing client.
  • View all requests with filters (Status, Source, Date Range, Assigned To).
  • View request details (client info, service description, creation date, source, assigned technician).
  • Status workflow: New → In Progress → Converted → Closed.
  • One-click Convert to Quote or Convert to Job.
  • Track Request Source (Website, Call, Referral, Email, Walk-in).
  • Push converted Quotes/Jobs to Zoho master account (unidirectional).
  • Audit log each conversion (user, timestamp, type, result).

item.title: [OJ-78] Schedule Page
item.description:
Build the Schedule Page that enables users to view and manage team jobs, appointments, and visits in a calendar or list format.
Users should be able to view by day/week/month, drag and drop to reschedule, and filter the view by employee or location.
All data should sync from FuseTrix backend (no direct Zoho read; push updates only via master account → unidirectional flow to Zoho FSM/Books).

Functional Requirements

  • Display a calendar view (default: week view) using a UI library (e.g., FullCalendar or React Big Calendar).
  • Display a list view toggle for simplified job listing.
  • Show jobs/appointments with title, client name, location, and technician.
  • Enable drag-and-drop rescheduling (updates job date/time via API).
  • Filter controls: Employee dropdown, Location dropdown, Date range.
  • “Add Job” button to quickly create a new job (opens modal).
  • Backend to provide calendar events via /jobs/schedule?start=&end=&employee=&location=.
  • On drop/reschedule → call PUT /jobs/:id/reschedule to update timing.
  • Optional: "Sync to Google Calendar/iCal" placeholder button (stubbed for now).

item.title: [OJ-77] Clients Page
item.description:
Build Clients page MVP that lists, searches, creates and edits clients from FuseTrix DB. Add a single-client “Push to Zoho” action which sends the client record to the master Zoho account (unidirectional FuseTrix → Zoho CRM/Books). Record audit logs for pushes.

Acceptance Criteria:

  1. Clients list with search, pagination, sort implemented.
  2. Client detail drawer, create/edit form functional.
  3. Single-client push endpoint /clients/:id/push-zoho implemented and called from UI.
  4. Push action creates an audit log (user, timestamp, payload, response, status).
  5. Push button visible only to allowed roles.
  6. Basic unit tests and one E2E smoke test for push flow.
  7. Staging deployed and smoke-tested.

Tasks/Subtasks:

  • BE: Implement list/detail/create/update endpoints.
  • BE: Implement /clients/:id/push-zoho and /crm/logs.
  • FE: Build ClientsPage, ClientDetailDrawer, ClientFormModal.
  • FE: Implement Push confirmation modal & toasts.
  • QA: Write and run smoke test for push flow.
  • DOCS: Add README for env vars and testing instructions.
